text: hello lovely people welcome to

silky soaked muesli really healthy
delicious comforting fills you up and
lasts a long time
well into the day let me get you into

about 15 years ago it was a cross
between a granola which it actually is
nothing like granola and I thought it

bit of a whippersnapper bit stupid
anyway
I call it piccola very simply get

we'll use a coarse grater grate in your

only other things that you can put in is

like 150 years ago I mean this is just a

and they're chewy again there's natural

basically that's the end of the story
now the magic that happens now is

the magic that happens now is time okay
so we're going to put that in an

it will look exactly the same but what

there's absolutely gorgeous the next

you know any seeds sunflower seeds you

sesame seeds if you just crush them
lightly in a pestle and mortar it really

so just by smashing them up in your
